means: 蒙默思郡（英国威尔士原郡名）

sentence.Network_en: Monmouth was founded in 1933 to provide opportunity for higher education to area school graduates.
sentence.Network_cn: 学校始建于1933年,原名蒙莫斯学院,旨在为当地高中毕业生提供高等教育机会.

sentence.Network_en: Monmouth University is located in an attractive community less than a mile from the Atlantic Ocean.
sentence.Network_cn: 蒙莫斯大学(又译:蒙默思大学)位于风光迤逦的大西洋之滨.

sentence.Network_en: In 1956, Monmouth College accredited by the state to offer four - year programs leading the baccalaureate degree.
sentence.Network_cn: 1956年, 蒙莫斯学院获得州政府授权招收四年制本科生.
